entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
